name: Robo-Spud Dungeon Defence
description:
This game was made while watching a Udemy course on Unity game development. Check out their page if you are interested.

 https://www.udemy.com/course/creating-a-cool-2d-action-game-in-unity/

Robo Spud Dungeon Defence

Defeat waves of oncoming enemies, collect powerful upgrades and aim to reach the final boss at the end.

Controls

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Left Click: Shoot
